description:
Finally reunited and returned to their proper bodies, the Straw Hats fall in line as Luffy and Law lead the charge to settle the score with Caesar - and save the children!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En route pour le bâtiment R. L’alliance pirate à l’attaque !
Get to Building R! The Pirate Alliance`s Great Advance!
Цель - Корпус R! Пиратский Альянс идет на Штурм!
めざせR棟! 海賊同盟快進撃!
